name: 2 in 1
description:
A short interactive story about duality.
Made in hand-drawn, classic 2D animation.

Length: 2-3 minutes 

Designed, animated and coded by me (Lila Egozy)

Guidance & emotional support: Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan
Made as part of Art & Interaction course in
Bezalel Academy of Arts and design, 2023
